answers.author: Stephanie Klinkenberger
answers.text:
Hello,
For the City of Virginia Beach, the job title that encompasses cleaning and maintaining restrooms is Custodial Worker I.  In particular, the job duties mention "cleans rest room fixtures, walls and floors with a germicidal disinfectant to remove bacterial germs and odors".  Please see attached for complete job description.
